name: プロデューサー
text:
──じゃあ、みんな
今日は移動に撮影に、お疲れ様
trans:
──Alright, everyone. Good job going around for the
shoot.

name: プロデューサー
text:
明日も朝早いし
ゆっくり休んでくれ！
trans:
Tomorrow's also going to be an early morning, so
make sure you all get a good night's rest!

name: 雛菜
text: 雛菜ここの布団がいい～～～
trans: Hinana will have the futon here～～～

name: 円香
trans:
Agh...
Hey, you stirred up the dust.

name: 雛菜
text:
雛菜もう寝そう～
今日もすっごい頑張ったからな～
trans:
Hinana wanna sleep already～
I worked real hard today, so～

name: 雛菜
text:
じゃあ透先輩も
すっごい頑張ったってことだ～！
trans:
Toru-senpai also worked really hard today, so you
deserve a good rest too～!

name: 円香
text:
……どうでもいいけど、眠い
私は寝る
trans: ...Whatever. I'm sleepy too. I'm heading to bed.

name: 雛菜
text:
そうだね～
明日朝からなんだっけ～、座禅？
trans:
Oh yeah～ What are we doing first tomorrow
morning～, zazen?  (Note: Religious zen meditation)

name: 雛菜
text:
やりながら寝ちゃったら
どうしよう～
trans: What'll happen if we fall asleep doing it?

name: 円香
text:
いいんじゃない
１回くらい叩かれた方が目が覚めて
trans:
That's not so bad, is it. You'll be wide awake after
getting wacked by the stick. (Note: A stick (Keisaku)
is used to rouse those who fall asleep)

name: 雛菜
text:
ま、いいや
早く寝よ～
trans: Well, anyways, let's go to bed already～

name: 雛菜
text: 雛菜が起きてなかったら起こしてね～？
trans: Wake Hinana up if I don't wake up, alright～?

name: 雛菜
trans: Think you can wake up in time～?

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～
じゃあ小糸ちゃん！
trans:
Aha～
Then it's up to you, Koito-chan!

name: 雛菜
text:
明日の朝、雛菜が起きてなかったら
起こしてね～って
trans:
I said, to wake Hinana up tomorrow morning if I can't
wake up on time～

name: 雛菜
text:
そう～！
小糸ちゃんが！

name: 雛菜
text:
だって、円香先輩は起こしてくれないし
ちゃんと起きれるの、小糸ちゃんくらいでしょ～？
trans:
Cos, Madoka-senpai won't wake me up, and
Koito-chan's probably going to be the only one who'd
get up on time, right～?

name: 雛菜
text:
それなら小糸ちゃんに
お願いするしかないよ～
trans:
Since that's how it is, Koito-chan's the only one I can
ask to wake me up～

name: 小糸
text:
じゃ、じゃあとりあえず
アラームかけておこう
trans: I-In any case, I'll set an alarm.

name: 雛菜
text:
ん～
10分前くらいに起きれば間に合うかな～？
trans:
Alright～ Waking up 10 minutes earlier is enough,
right～?

name: 円香
text: 寝起きすぐは顔がむくんで見えるんじゃない
trans:
Didn't you say that our faces will look puffy right
after we wake up?

name: 雛菜
text:
ま、雛菜ちょっとむくんでても
かわいいからいいか～
trans:
Well, even if my face does puff up a little, Hinana will
still be cute, so that's okay～

name: 雛菜
text: 寝起きの雛菜が見られるのはこの番組だけ～
trans:
This program will be the only show you can catch
Hinana right after she wakes up～

name: 小糸
text:
……よ、よし
セットしたよ、みんなは？
trans:
...A-Alright, I've set the alarm. Is everyone ready to
sleep?

name: 円香
trans: I am. Switching off the lights.

name: 透
text:
起きてたじゃん
バスとかも
trans: You were awake, on the bus and all that.

name: 小糸
text:
な、なんか
色々、考えちゃって……
trans: W-Well, I was thinking about, erm, some stuff.

name: 小糸
text: 目が冴えてきちゃったから……

name: 小糸
text:
……し、静かだから、窓閉まってても
波の音が聞こえるんだよ、ここ
trans:
...You know, it's so quiet you can hear the waves
through the windows from here.

name: 小糸
text:
番組の人が
どういうふうにしてほしいのか、とか……
trans:
Like, how do the program staff actually want us to
carry out the tasks...

name: 小糸
text:
面白くって、どうやってやればいいか
とか……
trans:
And like, how should we do things so that they look
interesting...

name: 小糸
text:
ファンの人とか視聴者の人が
わたしたちに
trans: Also, what do our fans and viewers,

name: 小糸
text: どんなふうになってほしいのか、とか……

name: 小糸
text:
……ご、ごめんね
変なこと聞いちゃって
trans: ...I-I'm sorry, for asking these weird things.

name: 小糸
trans: ...There's no way we would know, right?

name: 小糸
text: ひ、引きとめちゃって、ごめんね……！
trans: I-I'm sorry, for keeping you here to talk...!

name: 透
text:
いる？　まだ
ここ

name: 小糸
trans: ...I'll go to sleep in a bit.

name: 円香
text:
もう起きる時間まで
そんな無いし
trans: There's not much more time until we need to wake.
